title: Twisted Fate Lore
body: Just some continuity issues with the lore. In the new Twisted Fate [bio](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/07/red-post-collection-updated-lore-for-gp.html) he changed his name after he had split with Malcom Graves, so why is it that in the [Bilgewater act one part two](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/#story-1-part-2) Graves Refers to him as TF?

replies.body: Because his name has always been TF. However, it didn't always stand for "Twisted Fate."

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HEm2371e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-24T21:34:59.963+0000)
>
> Because his name has always been TF. However, it didn't always stand for "Twisted Fate."

Tobias Fortune

He is the lost brother of Miss Fortune


............. okay no

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HEm2371e,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-07-24T21:57:39.354+0000)
>
> Tobias Fortune
> 
> He is the lost brother of Miss Fortune
> 
> 
> ............. okay no

Tobias Fortune, Tobias Fate....anything can go. Your assumptions might not be wrong just yet.
While you're here, I'd like to let you know that everybody loves the event's lore :3 Great job.
That's most kind of you. I'll pass your regards on to the rest of the team, but we're grateful to you and everyone who supports the work by participating and giving feedback. Thank you.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HEm2371e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-24T21:34:59.963+0000)
>
> Because his name has always been TF. However, it didn't always stand for "Twisted Fate."

It's Tobias right? Is he actually Tobias Funke from Arrested Development? :o
